## Reporter interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Reporter instance that formats comparison reports.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Reporter 
```

## Remarks

Reporters transform comparison reports into human-readable or machine-readable formats. The `format` method is required; other methods are optional lifecycle hooks.

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[end()?](./change-detector-core.reporter.end.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Called after all formatting is complete.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[format(report)](./change-detector-core.reporter.format.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Formats a complete comparison report.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[formatChange(change)?](./change-detector-core.reporter.formatchange.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Formats a single change (for streaming/incremental output).


</td></tr>
